Title: Relates to prohibiting the use or access of the TikTok application on state-issued electronic devices
Summary: Prohibits the use or access of the TikTok application on state-issued electronic devices.
LawCode: Add ยง106-c, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state technology law, in relation to prohibiting the use or access of the TikTok application on state issued electronic devices
